claim.speaker: Speaker
claim.wear_tear: My phone is damaged beyond wear and tear and is not useable.*
claim.wear_tear_warning: Please note you are not covered for cosmetic damage such as wear and tear*
claim.unlock_notification: Please note we will not be able to repair your device if you haven't removed it from iCloud/ Google Account/Samsung Account. More Information on
claim.device_unlocked: Device has been unlocked and PIN has been removed.*
claim.valid_data_confirmation: I confirm that the details I have provided are accurate and that I am happy for the policy administrator to make any further enquiries in order to validate my claim. I understand that any timescales associated with the claims process will nor start until all requested information is provided.*
claim.privacy_policy_agreement: I have read and agree with the Data Privacy Policy.*
claim.possession: Who was in possession of your device at te time of theft?
claim.in_belgium: Where you in Belgium at the time of incident?
claim.wear_tear_mbi: My phone is damaged beyond wear and tear
claim.wear_tear_warning_mbi: Please note that you are not covered for cosmetic damages such as normal wear and tear
claim.pickup_time: Choose a date for checking estimated pick-up time to your location
claim.pickup_address: Which address should we pick up the phone
claim.name: Name
claim.mbi_purchase_note: Device can be repaired for free through shop. In case of proceeding with the claim, the excess fee will be charged and remaining warranty will be replaced by warranty from CTDi
claim.imei_tooltip: The IMEI-number of your device is an unique identifier. It consists of 15 numbers and usually starts with ‘35’. You can find your IMEI-number by either dialing *#06# on your phone or by going into the general settings/info of your phone. The IMEI can also often be found on the invoice of your phone. In some cases, the IMEI is also printed on the back of your phone.
claim.imeicheck_success: We found the following device based on your imei:
claim.imeicheck_notfound: Sorry! We couldn't find your device, please call the contact center!
claim.claim_approved: Your claim has been successfully auto approved!
claim.claim_referred_damage: Your damage claim has been well received and will be examined in detail. You will be informed of the next steps by e-mail.
claim.claim_referred_theft: Your theft claim has been well received and will be examined in detail. You will be informed of the next steps by e-mail.
claim.claim_referred_breakdown: Your breakdown claim has been well received and will be examined in detail. You will be informed of the next steps by e-mail.
claim.customer_tooltip: You can modify your email and address data on profile page!
claim.ctdi_missing_spare-action: You have successfully submitted your intent
claim.brandmodel_hover: Please give your imei and we check your device for brand and model!
claim.warranty: We detected that your unit is still in warranty after the last intervention. Your request will be treated as a warranty claim
claim.claim_referred_warranty: Your warranty claim has been well received and will be examined in detail. You will be informed of the next steps by e-mail.
claim.claim_warranty_expired: This device is from a previous intervention but the warranty period has expired. Your claim will be treated as a normal claim.
claim.samsung_alert1: As a result of the current Covid-19 measures, there is a worldwide shortage of parts for your device.
claim.samsung_alert2: Consequently, we must inform you that the repair of your device may take up to 5 working days.

claimhistory.noclaim: You don't have any claim submitted yet!
claimhistory.too_many_orders_message: You have too many orders connected to your claim! Please call the contact center to handle this!
claimhistory.too_many_opened_claim_message: Normally you could have one opened claim, but for some reason you have more! Please call the contact center!
claimhistory.claim_approved_shipment: Your claim has been approved you can choose time for pickup
claimhistory.missing_spares_message: The repairer doesn't have spare parts in stock so the repairment process would take more time! Please call the contact center!
claimhistory.shipment_pickup_notification: Your last pickup request was unsuccessful! Please send a new pickup request!
